name: Montana_(Invitation_to_Love)
text:
Montana (Invitation to Love)
Montana was a character from Invitation to Love, portrayed by Jason Denbo.
He planned on killing Chet Weems, in order to gain control of the Towers for himself and Emerald.
In a subsequent episode, he was seen beating up Chet and warning him to never cross him, an altercation witnessed by a gagged Jared.
In a cliffhanger ending, Montana was shot by Chet. After being shot, he stared in horror at Chet.
Another episode showed Montana offering a drink to a reluctant Jade.
